abstract: Previewing the weekend's important international soccer games, Oct. 7, 2011.
snippet: Previewing the weekend's important international soccer games, Oct. 7, 2011.
lead_paragraph: The United States won't play its friendly against Honduras in Miami until Saturday night, but a lot of important games are on the calendar before then. World Cup qualifying begins in South America on Friday, and Euro 2012 qualifying will be over by Tuesday.
